title: For the dawnbringer riven can you get the border before you get the skin?
body:
For the dawnbringer riven can you get the border before you get the skin? in Loot also does if so does it keep in loots forever ?
TY

replies.body: You can get the border first yes, But it will only be visible when you have the Skin on
what im was gonna to do is to redeem the border first then i will get the skin after the event so basically i wants the border
